Reason: The configuration 'batch_size_warn_threshold_in_kb' is classified as performance-sensitive. The reason for this classification is that the configuration directly impacts system performance by determining the threshold at which a warning log is triggered when a multiple-partition batch size exceeds the specified value. Increasing the size of this threshold can potentially lead to node instability and performance issues, indicating that the configuration involves performance-related operations that can have a notable impact on system performance.
